subject: Re: [junit] Method assertEquals
msgSnippet: ... System.out.println System.err.println A logging package like log4j Regards, Rob __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!? Send your
messageBody:
--- Sriram Anandraj <ssaeenat@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Robert/Vladimir,
>
> You both r right. Message is thrown only when the test fails.
> No matter whatever testrunner implementations we use.
>
> But is there any way to print my messages instead of a dot even when
> the test
> passes.

System.out.println
System.err.println
A logging package like log4j

Regards,

Rob
